summary:
Collaborate with, and support the AWS APJ (Asia Pacific & Japan) Solutions Engineering team, for creating and maintaining customer-facing technical documentation for customisable solutions. 
 Review and write implementation guides, solution artifacts, and code documentation.
Mentor aspiring and transitioning technical writers through the ADPList platform.

Help the documentation community by advocating for a docs-like-code approach and offering them the skills and know-how to make it happen. Managing open-source documentation program as part of Google Season of Docs.
Planned, designed and created online documentation for AEMO internal and external portals across gas and electricity market applications.
Set up content design for onboarding and developer platforms. Created API documentation for recruitment partners and developers.
Developed and managed product and technical documentation including API content for developer portal and B2B users.
Documented processes, procedures and other content for FedRAMP security project.
Led a technical writing team documenting business processes for network operations and performance teams.
Created product content (Help, Release Notes, Feature Guides) for a student housing software
Worked with data warehouse development team to plan and deliver developer guides and reference material.
Led and mentored 2 technical writers working on a Smart Metering project.
Planned and created process documentation for a student management system implementation.
Scoped, designed and created a National Procedures Manual.
User content, Process documentation, Policy writing, Information Architecture projects for Australia Post, Alex Fraser Group, ANZ, Toyota Australia, DownerEDI Works, Elders Australia, BUPA.
Created online help (HTML and Web) for share registry desktop and web applications.
Developed context-sensitive online help for a radiology information system.
